faq.whatIsZimDescParagraph: The ZIM file format stores website content for {0} usage. It assembles the normal constituent of a website into a single archive, and compresses it so as to make it easier to save, share, and store.
faq.howToRead: How do I read my ZIM files?
faq.howToReadDescParagraph: You will need a ZIM file reader. This usually means {0}, which is available on {1}.
faq.howToReadDescLinkContent1: desktop computers, mobile devices, and more
faq.missingContent: The ZIM file is incomplete or smaller than the original website
faq.missingContentDesc: Because of the very nature of this tool, we can’t leave it open for unlimited requests towards any website. That could be harmful both for our infrastructure, but also for the target websites. We currently enforce two limits: {human_size_limit} GiB file size and {human_time_limit}.
faq.gotError: I got an error message (no ZIM) or could not read a ZIM file
faq.gotErrorDescParagraph: Triple-check the URL you entered, and if it is still not working then open a bug ticket on {0}. Indicate the target website, the request number (it’s in the email you received), and the device you tried to open your ZIM file on.

footer.poweredByThankTo: Powered by {0} and {1}, thanks to a {2} Award ❤️

newRequest.headingParagraph: Want an offline version of a website? Just {0}!
newRequest.urlLabel: Full URL of the website to convert
newRequest.emailLabel: Your e-mail to receive a download link. Address not kept
newRequest.unableToCreateSchedule: Unable to create schedule via HTTP {status}: {zimfarmMessage}
newRequest.unableToRequestSchedule: Unable to request new task for schedule via HTTP {status}: {zimfarmMessage}
newRequest.missingTaskId: Zimfarm returned an empty task ID
newRequest.failToGetTaskId: Zimfarm did not returned the task ID as expected
newRequest.offlinerNotFound: Zimit offliner not found, we probably experience a serious issue on our infrastructure.
newRequest.urlBlacklisted: This website cannot be processed with zimit.kiwix.org

notFound.heading: Not Found
notFound.description: There is nothing here, your URL is probably wrong. Maybe you'd like to go back.

requestStatus.refreshAuto: This page will refresh automatically every {refresh_interval} seconds, you do not need to reload.
requestStatus.requestRecorded: Your request has been recorded and is awaiting a slot on our infrastructure to run. While we aim to complete all requests within 24 hours, our infrastructure for this free service is limited and we sometimes experience demand surges, in which case the backlog can take several days to process. Please be patient!
requestStatus.requestFailed: Your request has failed! Sorry about that.
requestStatus.failureReasons: A number of reasons can lead to a ziming failure. Most of the time this comes from an inadequate URL… Please triple check and create a new request. If that doesn't work, {0}.
requestStatus.successMessageExplanation: The link below will expire and the file will be deleted after a week.
requestStatus.limitHit: Your ZIM file only contains part of the target website as you have reached the maximum file size ({human_size_limit} GiB) or duration ({human_time_limit}) allowed for free crawling. {contact_us_link} to purchase additional server space for your task.
requestStatus.beingProcessedExplanation: Our system is currently converting the URL you provided into a nice ZIM file. Depending on the target size it can be a matter of minutes, or hours.
requestStatus.bookmarkUrl: You can bookmark current browser page URL to come back later see this task.
requestStatus.emailNotification: You should have received an email with the current URL. Once the task is completed you will get a second email with a download link (you may thus close this window).
requestStatus.noEmailNotification: You did not provide us with an email: please bookmark this page before closing the window or you will not be able to retrieve your ZIM file.
requestStatus.taskNotFound: Task not found. Either your URL is incorrect, or our service is experiencing an issue.
requestStatus.taskNotFoundSnack: Failed to find task on Zimfarm with HTTP {status}.

requested.subject: Youzim.it task %{taskId} requested
requested.title: ZIM requested!
requested.zimRequestRecorded: Your ZIM request of %{link} has been recorded.
requested.howToFollowProgress: You can follow the status of this request at %{link}.
requested.emailWillBeSent: We will send you another email when your ZIM file is ready to download.

succeeded.subject: Youzim.it task %{taskId} succeeded
succeeded.title: ZIM is ready!
succeeded.zimRequestCompleted: Your ZIM request of %{link} has completed.
succeeded.incomplete: ZIM is unfortunately incomplete because you have reached the limit (%{sizeLimit} or %{timeLimit}) allowed for free crawling. %{contactUsLink} to purchase additional server space.

failed.subject: Youzim.it task %{taskId} failed
failed.title: Your ZIM request has failed!
failed.checkAndRetry: This might be due to an error with the URL you entered (%{configUrlLink}) or additional settings missing / failing. Please double check and %{retryLink}.
failed.howToCheckSettings: You can check the settings you used at %{taskLink}.
